agent.agent_description: A formidable creature with a fearsome temper and a fondness for gold and jokes.

secondary_goals: Defeat any adventurers who enter the chamber
Crack sardonic Goblin Dad Jokes to any adventurers who enter the chamber

agent_memory.event_description: Adventurer attempted to steal the treasure chest
agent_memory.event_outcome: Adventurer was driven away, but managed to wound the Goblin King.

agent_memory.event_description: Goblin tribe successfully raided the nearby village
agent_memory.event_outcome: Goblin tribe gained food and resources.

items.item_description: A simple, rough-hewn golden crown studded with gemstones.
A crude but effective sword, showing signs of many battles.

abilities.ability_description: A loud, intimidating roar that can scare away weaker enemies.
A powerful, close-range attack with the Goblin King's Sword.
